title: How Digital Technology and the Pandemic will Accelerate Transformations
itunes:title: How Digital Technology and the Pandemic will Accelerate Transformations
description: Economics Nobel laureate Michael Spence discusses the many changes that await us in the wake of digital technology developments and the pandemic, which are combining in unexpected ways
